Articles.Content:
The rocket had to be hyperedited into kerbin's orbit because of unstability, but other then that this landing was legit!

No blunders, besides landing sideways and the solar panel being destroyed when the lander hit the ground.

Here's Jeb with the lander.

Made entirely with stock parts, except for the rocket which had kw rocketry fuel tanks.
Well, practice makes perfect, better luck next time, get back on the horse, and all that advice stuff.
